summary: Vanheden and Dynamit-Harry, together with Harry's fiancée Doris, are in Mallorca while Sickan is still in Stockholm. However, Wall-Enberg talks him into doing a break-in at Las Palmas ... See full summary »
cast: Gösta Ekman|Björn Gustafson|Ulf Brunnberg|Birgitta Andersson|Per Grundén|Margaretha Krook|Dan Ekborg|Kent Andersson|Roland Jansson|Johann Neumann|Catharina Alinder|Lennart Mankainen|Lillemor Hungi|Jose Guesp-Querglas|Elin Pless|Mia Pless
title: La banda de Jönsson en Mallorca
